mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_refund_order_flow ( order_form_id, payment_sn, order_date, refund_amount, original_amount, refund_reason, msg, status ) VALUES ( #{orderFormId}, #{paymentSn}, #{orderDate}, #{refundAmount}, #{originalAmount}, #{refundReason}, #{msg}, #{status} );
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_refund_order_flow SET order_form_id = #{orderFormId}, payment_sn = #{paymentSn}, order_date = #{date}, refund_amount = #{refundAmount}, original_amount = #{originalAmount}, refund_reason = #{refundReason}, msg = #{msg}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
